title: Normalize PathAlgebra functor instance
description: Normalize the PathAlgebra functor instance so algebraic paths reuse the same categorical structure.
intent: | PathAlgebraFunctor: identity functor instance for any PathAlgebra, exposing PathAlgebra as a CategoryLike and reusing the generic IdentityFunctor. This anchors the functor interface in the adequacy ...
acceptance: All Agda modules compile without errors
